Resources

Your first stop for any help related to computing with data should be the book: Getting used to R, RStudio, and R Markdown.

R

  • Datacamp: Intro to R Course: online platform for learning all dimensions of R

R Markdown

  • R Markdown debugging sheet: these steps solve about 85% of problems.

Data Science

  • The Elements of Data Analytic Style by Leek
  • R for Data Science by Grolemund and Wickham

Git and GitHub

  • Happy Git and GitHub for the useR

Reproducible Research

  • Reproducibility Guide
  • Albert Y. Kim's Webpage
